item.title: 华尔街公司在债券交易中支付的价格只有散户的一半
item.description: 散户投资者持有的市政债券份额最大，他们在交易最近发行的债券时所支付的利差大约是主要机构投资者的两倍。【原文：Retail investors, who hold the largest share of municipal bonds, pay roughly twice the spread that major institutional investors pay when trading recently issued debt.】

item.title: 国债供应增加，银行可能成为回购市场的 "终结者
item.description: 随着未来几年美国国债票息债券发行量的激增和融资需求的增长，银行将在回购协议市场上占据更大的份额。【原文：Banks will have a bigger footprint in the market for repurchase agreements as US Treasury coupon bond issuance swells and demand for financing grows in the coming years.】

item.title: 贡渥集团聘用 Pedersen 接替 Garza 担任美国交易主管
item.description: 全球最大的独立石油贸易公司之一贡渥集团（Gunvor Group）聘请加里-佩德森（Gary Pedersen）担任美国贸易主管，接替今年晚些时候退休的大卫-加尔萨（David Garza）。【原文：Gunvor Group, one of the world’s biggest independent oil-trading firms, hired Gary Pedersen as head of US trading to replace David Garza after he retires later this year, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 派拉蒙探索出售 12 家地方电视台
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）正在进行资产处置以筹集现金，熟悉内情的人士称，这与该媒体公司正在进行的收购活动有关。【原文：Paramount Global is moving ahead with asset disposals to raise cash, people familiar with the matter said, amid the ongoing takeover saga involving the media company.】

item.title: 巴西将赋予监管机构对天然气项目更多控制权
item.description: 根据彭博社审阅的一份草案，巴西政府正在起草一项法令，赋予石油监管机构对生产商如何运营天然气项目更大的控制权，以努力增加天然气供应，降低消费者的天然气价格。【原文：Brazil’s government is preparing a decree to give the oil regulator greater control over how producers operate natural gas projects in an effort to increase supplies and reduce prices for consumers, according to a draft reviewed by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 财政部长称加纳可可辛迪加谈判仍在继续
item.description: 据加纳财政部长称，加纳可可监管机构（即 Cocobod）仍在与外国贷款人谈判，以筹集银团贷款，为下一季作物生产提供资金。【原文：Ghana’s cocoa regulator, known as Cocobod, is still in talks with foreign lenders to raise a syndicated loan to fund the next season’s crop, according to the country’s finance minister.】

item.title: 新泽西州 "美国梦 "债券持有人将获得赠款支持债务的偿付
item.description: 为资助新泽西州梅多兰兹（Meadowlands）"美国梦 "大型购物中心的建设而出售的 2.87 亿美元市政债券的持有者，在连续两年未付款后，将于下周收到逾期利息。【原文：Holders of $287 million of municipal bonds sold to help finance the construction of the American Dream mega-mall in New Jersey’s Meadowlands are poised to receive overdue interest next week after two years of missed payments.】

item.title: 道明银行称，随着利率下调，加拿大房地产投资信托有望复苏
item.description: 道明高文（TD Cowen）认为，随着投资者对北美地区近期降息的信心增强，加拿大房地产投资信托基金有望反弹。【原文：Canadian real estate investment trusts are primed for a rebound as investors grow more confident in near-term rate cuts across North America, according to TD Cowen.】

item.title: 格里芬 54 层迈阿密大厦明年破土动工
item.description: 肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）预计将于明年在迈阿密破土动工建造一座 54 层的大厦，作为其 Citadel 金融帝国的总部，他还邀请了费城的一位开发商担任该项目的顾问。【原文：Ken Griffin is expecting to break ground next year on a 54-story tower in Miami that will serve as headquarters of his Citadel financial empire, enlisting a Philadelphia developer as a consultant on the project.】

item.title: 德克萨斯州 400 亿美元养老金聘请私人市场投资者
item.description: 德克萨斯州市政退休基金（Texas Municipal Retirement System）的首席投资官 Yup Kim 表示，该公司正在招聘三名投资人员，以扩大在私人市场的直接投资能力。【原文：Texas Municipal Retirement System is hiring three investment staff as it looks to expand direct investment capabilities in private markets, according to Yup Kim, chief investment officer of the $40 billion pension fund.】

item.title: 加拿大央行明年将更深更快地下调利率
item.description: 经济学家认为，加拿大央行将在下周的会议上连续第三次降息，随着通胀的缓解，明年的借贷成本预计将继续保持稳步下降的趋势。【原文：Economists see the Bank of Canada cutting interest rates for a third consecutive meeting next week, continuing what’s anticipated to be a steady downward trend in borrowing costs over the next year as inflation eases.】

item.title: 机组性能改善，Eskom 对避免南非停电持乐观态度
item.description: 南非国营电力公司预计至少在未来几个月内不会出现电力短缺，这也是该公司在扭亏为盈的同时连续出现电力短缺的又一例证。【原文：South Africa’s state power utility expects to avoid electricity shortages over at least the next few months, extending a streak that’s coincided with an operational turnaround.】

item.title: 红龙虾贷方聘请前张家辉掌门人 Adamolekun 担任首席执行官
item.description: Fortress 投资集团已任命 P.F. Chang's 的前首席执行官在 Red Lobster 被贷款人收购后领导其走出破产保护程序。【原文：Fortress Investment Group has appointed the former chief executive officer of P.F. Chang’s to lead Red Lobster when it is acquired by lenders out of Chapter 11.】

item.title: 矿商在最大供应国进行交易，铜供应风险缓解
item.description: 智利的铜矿开采业正在从紧张的工资谈判中摆脱出来，这预示着这个占供应量四分之一的国家出现进一步中断的风险正在降低。【原文：Chile’s copper-mining industry is emerging from an intense period of wage negotiations, signaling a diminished risk of further disruptions in a country that accounts for a quarter of supply.】

item.title: 交易员对美联储大幅降息的梦想看似被误导了
item.description:
政策大幅缩减后市场表现不佳

The market doesn’t do so well after big policy reductions

】

item.title: 马丁-什克里被勒令交出武当派独一无二的专辑
item.description: 联邦法官裁定，禁止马丁-什克里（Martin Shkreli）拥有和销售他的武当派独一无二的专辑《少林往事》。【原文：Martin Shkreli is prohibited from possessing and selling his one-of-a-kind Wu-Tang Clan album, “Once Upon a Time in Shaolin,” a federal judge ruled.】

item.title: 高盛集团的鲁布纳认为 S&P 500 指数本周将创下新高，引发 FOMO 热潮
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）全球市场董事总经理兼战术专家斯科特-鲁布纳（Scott Rubner）认为，来自企业回购和系统性基金的强劲资金流将推动 S&P 500 指数在本周创下历史新高，进一步加剧投资者的 "恐慌情绪"。【原文：Strong flows from corporate buybacks and systematic funds should drive the S&P 500 Index to a new all-time high this week, further increasing investors’ FOMO, according to Scott Rubner, managing director for global markets and tactical specialist at Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 尼日利亚将在 120 天内签署埃克森公司资产出售协议
item.description: 尼日利亚监管机构表示，他们预计将在四个月内正式同意埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp.【原文：Nigerian regulators said they expect to formally consent to Exxon Mobil Corp.’s sale of its oil and gas assets to Seplat Energy Plc within four months, ending a hiatus that has stalled the conclusion of a transaction that was first announced in February 2022.】

item.title: 巴西破产案激增 债权人为夺取土地而挣扎
item.description: 亚马逊雨林城市西诺普（Sinop）的一项法院判决使一家玉米和大豆生产商的土地免于被债权人没收，这一判决在相当于巴西华尔街的法里亚-利马大道（Faria Lima Avenue）上引起了反响。【原文：A court decision in the Amazon rainforest city of Sinop that shielded a corn and soybean producer’s land from seizure by creditors is reverberating through Faria Lima Avenue, the Brazilian equivalent to Wall Street.】

item.title: 麦可森将以 24.9 亿美元收购佛罗里达癌症连锁店股份
item.description: McKesson 公司同意收购一家私营诊所运营商佛罗里达癌症专科& 研究所旗下分支机构的控股权。【原文：McKesson Corp. agreed to buy a controlling stake in an arm of Florida Cancer Specialists & Research Institute, a privately held operator of clinics.】

item.title: 勒庞拒绝左翼总理，法国等待马克龙的人选
item.description: 法国极右翼国民联盟领导人玛丽娜-勒庞告诉埃马纽埃尔-马克龙，她的团体将反对左翼新人民阵线联盟的总理人选，因为马克龙总统正在努力物色一位能够在议会分裂的情况下执政的候选人。【原文：French far-right National Rally leader Marine Le Pen told Emmanuel Macron her group would oppose a prime minister from the leftist New Popular Front alliance as the president seeks to identify a candidate able to govern with a divided parliament.】

item.title: 加拿大将限制低工资外籍劳工入境
item.description: 加拿大将限制企业使用一项允许企业招聘低工资外国劳工的计划，因为该计划的规模急剧扩大，引发了欺诈和滥用指控。【原文：Canada will restrict businesses’ access to a program that allows them to recruit low-wage foreign labor after it exploded in size, spurring allegations of fraud and abuse.】

item.title: 新一代 ETF 摆脱先锋效应，收费接近十年新高
item.description: 超低成本的被动式 ETF 大受欢迎，推动了基金管理领域的惊人转变：新进入者的价格越来越高。【原文：The popularity of ultra-low cost passive ETFs is fueling a surprise shift in fund management: New entrants are getting pricier.】

item.title: 特朗普的 "钻井-婴儿-钻井 "誓言与其说是政策，不如说是伦理
item.description:
石油公司高管对大幅提高产量兴趣不大。【原文：

Oil executives have little appetite to dramatically boost output.

】

item.title: 美联储减息预期提振风险资产，新兴市场股市上涨
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）发出美国将从下月开始降息的信号后，新兴股市在中国科技蓝筹股的带动下恢复上涨。【原文：Emerging stocks resumed their advance, led by Chinese tech blue-chips, after Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell signaled that US interest rates would be reduced starting from next month.】

item.title: 波兰搜寻进入其领空的俄罗斯无人机
item.description: 波兰军队已开始搜寻在俄罗斯攻击邻国乌克兰期间进入其领空的无人驾驶飞行物。【原文：The Polish Army has started a search operation for an unmanned flying object that entered its airspace during Russia’s attack against neighboring Ukraine.】

item.title: 中国石油钻井业绩强劲，上半年创历史新高
item.description: 中国石油天然气股份有限公司（PetroChina Co.【原文：PetroChina Co. posted record earnings for the first half of the year as high drilling output and strong oil prices helped it weather weakening fuel demand in China.】

item.title: 加拿大将对中国电动汽车和钢铁征收关税
item.description: 加拿大将对中国制造的电动汽车、铝和钢材征收新的关税，站在西方盟国一边，采取措施保护国内制造商。【原文：Canada will impose new tariffs on Chinese-made electric vehicles, aluminum and steel, lining up behind western allies and taking steps to protect domestic manufacturers.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 本周伊始，交易员在中东紧张局势加剧的预期、美国明确降息信号对债券的支撑以及波音公司投资者为其后果做好准备的情况下表现谨慎。市场动态如下。【原文：Traders start the week cautiously in anticipation of more Middle East tensions, a clear US rate-cut signal supports bonds and Boeing investors brace for fallout. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Kristine Aquino】

item.title: 美国石油主导地位取决于新墨西哥州的宁静一角
item.description:
挑战 "欧佩克+"全球影响力的关键在于美国西南部的一小块地区，那里的钻井成本很高，而且大部分燃烧都是非法的。【原文：

The key to challenging the global influence of OPEC+ is a small swath of the American Southwest where drilling costs are high and most flaring is illegal.

】
